name: LDjam 45 - SHIPWRECKED
description:
SHIPWRECKED:

This game was made by @Ayxs (programming, sprites, animations, SFX) & @Bredera (sprites, animations, level design, music) for Ludum Dare 45.

We are really pleased with the end result and we hope that you all have a good time going through it!

Story:

You wake up on a desolate island, your ship a ghost of what she used to be, you have been shipwrecked.

Finding an old pirate hat let’s you think of better days, when you and your crew ruled the seas and brought fear to the established order. Determined to get another ship you set out on a janky raft to civilization.

Here trading means money, but for you trading means getting closer to another ship to once again rule the seas!

Gameplay:

The gameplay consists of a few mechanics: you can walk around, use your map to go to different island and you can trade with NPCs.

Movement:

A or Left Arrow : Walking to the left

D or Right Arrow : Walking to the right

F : pickup items

E : Open map (when near your raft / boat) & trade with NPCs

Mouse: Used in the map to select the islands you want to go to
